text:
Medfusion | Cary, NC | Full Time Onsite .NET Engineer | Desktop Applications

Medfusion is seeking an experienced .NET Engineer. Preferred experience includes desktop, installer, and continuous integration. Most of our stuff is on the Java stack but we have some .NET solutions and are looking for someone to take our .NET suite to the next level. We have a super cool work environment and awesome flexibility!

For immediate consideration, send me your resume at omar.meky@medfusion.com
